short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces thumbnails and titles of YouTube videos to prevent clickbait

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
### No Clickbait for YouTube

Tired of misleading thumbnails and sensationalized titles on YouTube? "No Clickbait for YouTube" is the Chrome extension you've been waiting for! Transform your YouTube experience with cleaner, more authentic content.

**Key Features:**

- **Thumbnail Replacement:** Automatically replace clickbait thumbnails with YouTube-generated alternatives. Choose from three variations for a more genuine preview of the video content.
- **Title Reformatting:** Remove excessive capitalization from video titles, making them easier to read and more trustworthy.
- **Channel Whitelist:** Customize your experience by adding up to 10 of your favorite channels to a whitelist in the free version. The complete (paid) version offers unlimited whitelisted channels.

**Why Install No Clickbait for YouTube?**

- **Enjoy Authentic Content:** Say goodbye to misleading thumbnails and exaggerated titles. Enjoy a more genuine and honest browsing experience.
- **Improve Readability:** Reformatted titles help you quickly understand video content without the distraction of ALL CAPS.
- **Personalize Your Experience:** Protect your favorite channels from being affected by the extension. 

Install "No Clickbait for YouTube" today and take control of your YouTube browsing experience. Enjoy videos as they were meant to be seen!
